original_text: Cursed shalt thou be when thou comest in, and cursed shalt thou be when thou goest out.
korean_text: 네가 들어와도 저주를 받고 나가도 저주를 받으리라

sentences.original_text: Cursed shalt thou be when thou comest in
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 들어갈 때에 저주를 받을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and cursed shalt thou be when thou goest out
